products.title: Armeria Blush Roman Blind
products.description: Delicate leaves climb the soft blush pink of the armeria blush roman blind. From the sanderson home collection, this exudes warmth and designer style, transforming any space to a cosy retreat in an instant. products.title: Armeria Pewter Roman Blind
products.description: A traditional style with a contemporary colour palette, this roman blind from the sanderson home range has a modern edge that will suit an array of settings. The cool grey tones bring a cosy element to the design, adding comfort to surroundings with the soothing colourway.
